target_markets.market_description: Parents with children ages 3-9 who have iPads and struggle with screen time control
demographics: willing to pay premium for peace of mind

kids continuing to access restricted content

target_markets.market_description: People with excessive browser bookmarks seeking organization
pain_points: lack of useful output from saved bookmarks

problems_validated.problem: Parental control systems are too complex and easily bypassed by children
problems_validated.severity: High - parents willing to pay $2000 for solution
problems_validated.current_solutions: Apple's built-in parental controls, Circle, various apps
problems_validated.market_gap: Current solutions are too technical and don't provide ongoing support

problems_validated.problem: Manual/trade skills becoming scarce in AI world
problems_validated.market_gap: Trade education needs modernization and better accessibility

problems_solutions.problem: Parents can't effectively control children's screen time
problems_solutions.solution: Physical consultant service for family screen time setup

startup_ideas.idea: Franchise for parental controls - physical consultants who set up family screen time rules

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Building software business when physical service might be better
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing opportunity for higher-value, more defensible business model
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Consider if problem needs human touch rather than just software
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Screen time consulting vs another parental control app

growth_tactics.results_expected: Established customer base for product launch

metrics_kpis.benchmark: Target for media business before product launch
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Focus on educational content around specific problem
